name: Animal world (ID Games)
description:
Animal world :

Help our explorer to rebuild the animal book. Discover multiple animals. A game full of adventures. Explore the world and discover as many animals possible.

Explore multiply biomes : caves, desert, land, woods, ...

Every biome has his own exclusive animals.


Discover many animals :

What's new ?

- Bug fixes

- Animation when discovering a new animal

What's coming in next update ?

- Bigger map

- More animals

- Bug fixes

For more informations follow me on youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfPU53GBkCj2FwfeeaPGn8g

My site : http://www.id-technologies.eu/ilian/ID_Games.html

Play Animal world on Liluo : https://liluo.io/games/625726f3-8f48-413a-b5c0-b75d45b6d18e
